Class DNAStringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • DNAStringUtils

  • public final class DNAStringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility functions for reading, writing and processing DNAString reads.

    • Method Summary

      Reads in a FASTA file and returns reads in a string array.

    • Method Detail

      • kmerCounts

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<DNAString,java.lang.Integer> kmerCounts(DNAString[] reads,
                                                                              int k)
        Computes for every k-mer and its reverse complement the number of reads which contain them.

        Parameters:
        reads - array of reads.
        k - k-mer length.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashSet mapping k-mers to counts.

      • readFasta

        public static DNAString[] readFasta(java.lang.String fileName)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Reads in a FASTA file and returns reads in a string array.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String containing full path to FASTA file.
        Returns:
        DNAString array containing reads.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • writeFasta

                              DNAString[] reads)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes DNAString array to FASTA file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to output file.
        reads - DNAString array containing reads.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • saveKmerCounts

        public static void saveKmerCounts(java.lang.String fileName,
                                  java.util.LinkedHashMap<DNAString,java.lang.Integer> counts)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Saves k-mer counts map to tab separated file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to output file.
        counts - Map as generated by kmerCounts.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • LevDistance

        public static int LevDistance(DNAString s1,
                              DNAString s2)
        Compute the Levenshtein distance between two DNAStrings.
        Parameters:
        s1 - first input DNAString.
        s2 - second input DNAString.
        Returns:
        Levenstein distance between s1 and s2.
